aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the presence of tag keys in the request

datapipeline:PipelineCreator.description: The IAM user that created the pipeline.

datapipeline:Tag.description: A customer-specified key/value pair that can be attached to a resource.

datapipeline:workerGroup.description: The name of a worker group for which a Task Runner retrieves work.
